nodes.text: The servant of Belo Tusus was a female Twi'lek. She served Tusus as he ruled Orto during the late stages of the Clone Wars, but later leaked vital information to the Jedi Knight Nem Bees.
Initially, Kyle Jewhurst, author of the Belo Tusus Databank entry, had intended for the servant to be the one featured briefly in Republic 79.
